system.description:
When you take this archetype at 1st level, your signature on a certain metaphysical compact grants you a pernicious boon. Choose one of the following:

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.ijfhr2n6bxczqg7v]{Dark Blessing}

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.vwk7xlbwtbjul4kf]{Diabolical Curse}
